import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import { useTranslation } from 'lib/../i18n' import { PoolDataContext } from 'lib/components/contextProviders/PoolDataContextProvider' import { Button } from 'lib/components/Button' import { NewPrizeCountdown } from 'lib/components/NewPrizeCountdown' import { PaneTitle } from 'lib/components/PaneTitle' import { handleCloseWizard } from 'lib/utils/handleCloseWizard' export function NoMoreTicketsPane(props) { const { t } = useTranslation() const router = useRouter() const handleClose = (e) => { e.preventDefault() handleCloseWizard(router) } const { pool } = useContext(PoolDataContext) return
